issue.title: [C++] Improve docstrings in new public APIs in arrow/compute and fix miscellaneous typos
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8926](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8926). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I've noticed some imprecise language while reading the headers and some other opportunities for improvement
